diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Pneumonia (left lower lobe), Intestinal Malabsorption, Paroxysmal orthostatic/tachycardic syndrome, Depression, Anemia (B12/Iron deficiency), Sjogren's Disease
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with severe abdominal pain and nausea, and pancreatic enzymes were elevated upon evaluation. Imaging studies indicated a cystic lesion in the pancreas and other abdominal findings consistent with acute pancreatitis.
